org.apache.archiva.repository

Interface RepositoryGroup

  • All Superinterfaces:
    EventSource, Repository, RepositoryStorage
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    EditableRepositoryGroup
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractRepositoryGroup, MavenRepositoryGroup

    public interface RepositoryGroup
extends Repository, RepositoryStorage
    Interface for repository groups. Repository groups are a combined view over a list of repositories. All repositories of this group must be of the same type. Repository groups are read only. You cannot store artifacts into a repository group. This interface extends RepositoryStorage to provide access to the merged index data files and other metadata.

      • getRepositories

        List<ManagedRepository> getRepositories()
        Returns the list of repositories. The order of the elements represents the order of getting artifacts (first one wins).
